about_the_game:
Take control of VINDICATOR, top of the line simulation vehicle. In this solo arcade infinite destruction racing game your goal is to obliterate evil M.I.N.D. LTD cars and enjoy the never ending ride. Have a moment and need to de-stress? There's nothing better than road mayhem!

Rules are easy - score as many points as you can before you die. Don't worry tho, you can take few hits before that happens.

Features

  • Infinite racing and destruction
  • Tailored for busy people - 5 to 10 minutes play session
  • Ever increasing difficulty - start slow, die hard
  • Original synthwave soundtrack @2fd5 bandcamp and soon on all streaming platforms
  • Easy to pick up gameplay
  • Local leaderboards
  • Infinite procedurally assembled environments
  • Vaporwave aesthetics
  • Keyboard only controls

How to play

  • AD / Left Right arrow for steering
  • W / Up arrow for boost
  • S / Down arrow for breaks
  • Spacebar to activate rechargeable front shield

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL supported
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: PulseAudio compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.6 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL supported

name: Synthroute 82
